alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 23 at 2:39PM MDT until April 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
